definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Pr 24:13 flowing honey, honey from the comb (Ph. [[נפת]] CIS:i.166, 8b);—´[[נ]] abs. Pr 5:3 + 3 t., cstr. Ps 19:11; —sweet Pr 24:13 (‖[[דְּבַשׁ]]), cf. Pr 27:7; fig. of sweet words Pr 5:3, and perh. Ct So 4:11 (Bu of kisses; ‖[[דְּבַשׁ]], [[חָלָב]]); in full ´[[נ]] [[חוּפִים]] Ps 19:11 honey of (the) combs (comp. with ´[[מִשְׁפְטֵי י]]; ‖[[דְּבַשׁ]]).
